metadata.synopsis: Balthazar's private chambers are unlocked and his flesh golem invites the players inside to talk
metadata.how_to_trigger: Triggers automatically when the players defeat the Dark Justiciars that attack Balthazar's hideout in Shar Temple

0.speaker: Flesh
0.context: CinematicNodeContext: The door to Balthazar's private chambers open, revealing a flesh golem. It utters a gurgle and beckons the player to enter.InternalNodeContext: Note - if the flesh golem is somehow unavailable, an alternate invitation will trigger with the necormancer instead.
